VERA UI

Getting Started

Conquer The Future with VERA UI

Installation Guide
Add Vera UI and use it in your projects in a fast and efficient manner!
CSS
Copy-paste the stylesheet <link> into your <head> to load our CSS.
JS
Many of our components require the use of JavaScript to function. Place our script at the end of your page content, right before the closing <body> tag, to enable them.
A word...
Make sure that you have set up your pages with the latest design and development standards. Use the HTML5 doctype and include the viewport meta tag for proper responsive behaviours.
Alert
